# hashValue

**Instance Property**

The hashed value of the power threshold alert.

## Declaration

```swift
var hashValue: Int { get }
```

## Comparing alerts

- **hash(into:)**: Hashes the essential components of the power threshold alert by feeding them into the given hash function.
- **!=(_:_:)**: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether two power threshold alerts aren’t equal.
- **==(_:_:)**: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether two power threshold alerts are equal.
